branchCity.title: Branch City
branchCity.description: Specifies the branch city where the quote originates or applies. Useful when presenting region-specific rates. Format as plain city names (“Houston”, “Dallas”).

interestRate.title: Interest Rate
interestRate.description: The percentage rate offered for the product. Show as a numeric value with up to two decimals (e.g., 3.25 %). The agent can verbalize this as “3.25 percent interest.”

minimumDeposit.title: Minimum Deposit
minimumDeposit.description: Monetary value indicating the minimum deposit or balance required to qualify for the rate. Display as currency with two decimal places (e.g., $5,000.00).

productType.title: Product Type
productType.description: Indicates which financial product category the quote belongs to (Checking, Savings, CD, Loan). The agent can use this value to filter or summarize results.

promotionalDescription.title: Summary
promotionalDescription.description: Free-text explanation of promotional terms or limited-time offers attached to the quote. Example: “3-Month introductory rate for new customers.”

quoteCurrency.title: Currency
quoteCurrency.description: Denotes the currency in which the quote values are expressed. Use standard ISO codes such as USD, CAD, GBP.

quoteReference.title: Quote Reference
quoteReference.description: Represents the Unique Identifier of the Quote. Should be used by the agent to reference specific quotes when communicating with users.

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: A concise summary of the quote combining key details for easy reference by the agent.

term.title: Term
term.description: Shows the duration or maturity period for the quoted product. Express in months or years (for example, “12 Months” or “5 Years”).

validUntil.title: Valid Until
validUntil.description: Represents the expiration date of the quote or offer. Display as a formatted date (MM/DD/YYYY). Example: “Valid until 12/31/2025.”
